text:
Heartiest congratulations from Embassy of India! 

8-year-old #cancer survivor Aronyatesh Ganguly from #Serampore bagged gold in table tennis at the World Children’s Winner Games in Moscow. 

https://t.co/5oiZsep4Oe

#sport #kids #champion #cancersurvivor
